changeSet.author: Oliviya Kustova
changeSet.sql: create table clients ( id int auto_increment primary key, name varchar(255) not null, surname varchar(255) null, address varchar(255) not null, phone_number varchar(255) not null, client_comment varchar(255) null );

changeSet.author: Oliviya Kustova
changeSet.sql: create table requests ( id int auto_increment primary key, date date not null, type_of_request varchar(255) not null, final_date date null, final_comment varchar(255) null, price varchar(255) null, client_id int null, constraint requests_clients_fk foreign key (client_id) references clients (id) );

changeSet.author: Oliviya Kustova
changeSet.sql: create table refrigerators ( id int auto_increment primary key, refrigerator_brand varchar(255) not null, brand_model varchar(255) null, refrigerator_comment varchar(255) null );

changeSet.author: Oliviya Kustova
changeSet.sql: create table details ( id int auto_increment primary key, part_name varchar(255) not null, part_price varchar(255) null, refrigerator_id int null, request_id int null, constraint parts_refrigerators_fk foreign key (refrigerator_id) references refrigerators (id), constraint parts_requests_fk foreign key (request_id) references requests (id) );

changeSet.author: Oliviya Kustova
changeSet.sql: create table requests_refrigerators ( id_refrigerator int not null, id_request int not null, constraint refrigerators_requests_fk foreign key (id_refrigerator) references refrigerators (id), constraint requests_refrigerators_fk foreign key (id_request) references requests (id) );
